onboarding.title: Multi Chain Crypto
onboarding.description: The multiple chain and secure gateway to all your crypto space

warning-screen.title: Keep your seed phrase safe!
warning-screen.description1: You will need these words to restore your wallet if your browser's storage is cleared or your device is damaged or lost.
warning-screen.description2: Never share your seed phrase (or your private keys) with anyone or enter it into any form, as it provides full control of your wallet.
warning-screen.description3: BBA Labs or Development Team will never ask for your recovery phrase or private keys.

create-screen.title: Your Seed Phrase
create-screen.description: You will need these words to restore your wallet if your browser's storage is cleared or your device is damaged or lost.

recovery-screen.title: Security Recovery Phrase
recovery-screen.description: Restore an existing wallet with your 12 or 24-word secret recovery phrase

settings.confirm-reset: Do you want to reset all private key on this device?
